Sentencas: Hydrogen is a sought-after environmentally friendly energy source for the fuel of SOFC.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: However, it is difficult to liquefy, has low energy density, and is flammable, making it difficult to promote its use.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: Methanol is easy to obtain, can be stored as a liquid, and has a high hydrogen-to-carbon ratio.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: This makes it an ideal alternative hydrogen energy source.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: To assess the advantages and disadvantages of using methanol as the SOFC fuel, a comparison was made between methanol-fueled SOFC and hydrogen-fueled SOFC.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: The maximum power of the hydrogen SOFC is only slightly higher than that of the methanol SOFC.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: The study also analyzed the effects of key influencing factors on current density, component distribution temperature, and other factors.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: The inlet temperature of 1173 K differs by up to 0.1 V from the activation overpotential at 1073 K.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: The water-to-carbon ratio has a greater impact on the performance of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: At the inlet temperature of 800degree celsius, the power density is 4630 W/m2 higher when the carbon-to-water ratio is 1 than when that is 4.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: At the fuel flow rate of 0.25 m/s, the fuel utilization rate can reach 100%.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming

Sentencas: These findings are important for understanding and optimizing energy conversion systems for SOFC technologies based on internal reforming.
Titulo: Investigation of the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells with methanol internal reforming
